comments.author: philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.creator: philip.chee@gmail.com

comments.text:
Strg (Steuerung) is German for Ctrl (Control).

This is a regression; worked in SM 2.0, broken since 2.1. I guess it's due to the move from a <window> to a <dialog> (or the other way round? Didn't check).

Confirming and moving to appropriate component.
comments.raw_text:
Strg (Steuerung) is German for Ctrl (Control).

This is a regression; worked in SM 2.0, broken since 2.1. I guess it's due to the move from a <window> to a <dialog> (or the other way round? Didn't check).

Confirming and moving to appropriate component.
